column4: i got a new laptop today and it have two cards: intel and ATI...how to check which card is running?
how do i check that my graphic card is in use?
anyone having dual cards in laptop? how to check and swith between cards? I got intel and ATI. Help.
does it switch them dynamically in windows?
no manually....
but you can switch them?
switches automatically when power source is plugged out
yep
I heard about smthing called switcheroo
are you sure it's amd and not nvidia?
yeh its ati hd 4650
it has got hybrid crossfire technology or smthing like that which makes it possible
sry. i don't know but i would like to know as well.
also. does someone know if nvidia optimus is supported in linux?
I found a article on wiki...and I did exactly as mentioned...but it didnt work. https://help.ubuntu.com/community/HybridGraphics
you can check which one is active in /var/log/Xorg.0.log
its flgrx
then the ati card is running
there is no point on spending money on expensive hardware for using Ubuntu...nothing works
not entirely true but graphics drivers have always been an issue...
anyway thanks for the help :)
